original_title: 「えっ、先輩終電逃したの！？ウチ泊まります？」女子社員の誘いに乗ったらすっぴんと無防備な部屋着に僕は理性が吹っ飛び…
overview: Newlywed Satoshi, who has been working overtime due to the rush of presentations, is almost at the end of work and is drenched in coffee made by Marin. "Senior, I'm near my company, so please stop by because I have a change of clothes." Satoshi's gaze is already glued to her beautiful body in her loungewear and unprotected chirarism, and he misses her last train... No makeup young face, no panties & no bra! I Was Jacked Into My Brain And Fucked All Night Long...
title: "Well Senior, Did You Miss The Last Train!? Will You Stay At My House?”
